definitions.definition: the part of the body at the bottom of the leg on which a person or animal stands:
examples: I've got a blister on my left foot.

definitions.definition: to stand up after you have been sitting:
examples: He rose to his feet when she walked in.
Are you going by bicycle or on foot?

definitions.definition: to pay an amount of money:
examples: His parents footed the bill for his college tuition.
